Package ex0

Class Graph_Algo

java.lang.Object
ex0.Graph_Algo
All Implemented Interfaces:
graph_algorithms
public class Graph_Algo
extends java.lang.Object
implements graph_algorithms
This class represents the "regular" Graph Theory algorithms including: 0. clone(); 1. init(String file_name); 2. save(String file_name); 3. isConnected(); 5. int shortestPathDist(int src, int dest); 6. List shortestPath(int src, int dest);
See Also:
graph_algorithms

    • isConnected

      public boolean isConnected()
      This algorithm traverse the graph and check connectivity of all nodes. The algorithm use BFS method for graph traversal. The algorithm works as followed: 1) Mark all nodes as not visited by setting their tags to 0 2) Pick some node - call it v 3) Mark v as visited by set its tag to 1 4) add v to a queue 5) while the queue not empty commit: - set v as the outcome of the queue pop - for all neighbor n of v: -- if not visited - add it to the queue and mark it as visited 6) traverse the graph and return false if their is a node who still marked as not visited.
      Specified by:
      isConnected in interface graph_algorithms
      Returns:
      TRUE if the graph is connected.

    • shortestPathDist

      public int shortestPathDist​(int src, int dest)
      This algorithm searching for the shortest path between given source and destination. The algorithm use BFS method for graph traversal. The algorithm works as followed: 1) Mark all nodes as not visited by setting their tags to 0 3) Mark v as visited by set its tag to 1 4) add v to a queue 5) while the queue not empty commit: - set v as the outcome of the queue pop - for all neighbor n of v: -- if not visited - add it to the queue and mark it as visited 6) traverse the graph and return false if their is a node who still marked as not visited.
      Specified by:
      shortestPathDist in interface graph_algorithms
      Parameters:
      src - - start node
      dest - - end (target) node
      Returns:
      the shortest path between given source and destination.

    • shortestPath

      public java.util.List<node_data> shortestPath​(int src, int dest)

      Specified by:
